entry.title: La Fruitiere - Frozen Pink Grapefruit Puree - 1 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: La Fruitiere
Type: BAKING
Price: 17.49

Made with real Fruits , this puree has a low viscosity and bitterness, and is high in aromatic fragrance, acidity, and sweetness, with an all-around full-bodied taste. This puree is made without preservatives and does not contain artificial colors or flavors. In fact, this puree was created to maintain its original characteristics to let its most natural taste, color, and texture shine in your menu items, any time of the year.

Packaged in a state-of-the-art tray, optimal efficiency and economical practice is prioritized to get the most out of this top-quality puree. The tray is designed to take up the least amount of space in your refrigerator or freezer, as well as being able to stack on top of one another for perfect organization.

The puree itself is easy to unmold and portion, and can also be defrosted for 24 hours in the refrigerator, or thawed in a baine Marie or microwave for easy pouring. Plus, the tray is designed with three tapered edges to have full control over pouring for exact measuring and less messes. When you're done using the puree, the lid is designed with a snap-on seal to let you know that it is properly closed.

The flavor characteristics of this puree are as versatile as it is in application. With this puree, crafting anything from cocktails to desserts is simple. This puree can be used in fruit glazes, simple syrups, sabayon, meringues, pastry creams, cremeux, and even as a macaroon filling. 

This puree can be used to make parfaits, yogurts, sorbets, ice creams, and even cocktails with gin and Sherry. It also pair very well with stone fruits, nectarines, rhubarb, various subtle nuts such as almonds and hazelnuts, or warm cinnamon, zingy ginger, bright mint, and floral thyme.

The natural FRUIT PUREES made from selected fruits and cane sugar are ready-to-use and particularly suitable as an ingredient in confectioneries, for making ice cream, for making confectionery and chocolate, for cooking and for cocktail bars. 

Made by extracting and filtering a juice, from selected varieties.

La Fruitiere - Pink Grapefruit Puree - 1 Kg

entry.title: Whole Lotta - Dark Chokolada Ganache - 13 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Whole Lotta
Type: BAKING
Price: 99.99

Whole Lotta - Dark Chokolada Ganache - 13 Kg

Ganache is normally made by heating equal parts by weight of cream and chopped chocolate, warming the cream first, then pouring it over the chocolate. The mixture is stirred or blended until smooth, with liqueurs or extracts added if desired. ... This pairs well with a dark chocolate between 60-82%.
Main ingredients: Dark semi-sweet chocolate

Dawn - Strawberry Glaze - 9.07 Kg

A donut just isn’t a donut until it’s glazed. Fresh fruit, pastry and pies take on a whole new persona when they are spruced up with glaze. Take your donuts and pies to the next level with our full line of easy-to-use glazes. You can count on consistent sheen, simple application and rich flavors that will keep your customers coming back for more.

Harvest - Candied Glazed Mixed Fruit - 1.5 Kg

Fruit Mix is a glazed mix full of orange and lemon peel, cherries, pineapple and citron for a colorful candied creation! Try adding this mix to your favorite fruit salad recipe or as an ingredient in holiday fruit cake. This special mello mix also makes a beautiful garnish for drinks and other desserts.

Candied Mix Fruit also known as glace Mix Fruit have been a part of candied fruit recipes for generations. Candied Mix Fruit are sweet and chewy, and complement red candied Mix Fruit in a variety of recipes, making for a more colorful and tasty baked treat.

  • Gives a lustrous clear finish to all your baked goods; stays soft and moist without drying when applied to your cakes and pastries

entry.title: Puratos - Miroir Neutre - 5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Puratos
Type: BAKING
Price: 52.99

Puratos - Miroir Neutre - 5 Kg

Our range of high-quality glazes, Miroir makes bavarois and mousses both shiny and attractive. Miroir is the perfect product to reflect style and art in the fine patisserie sector. 

  • Ready-to-use glaze
  • Apply cold

The art of patisserie decoration has been handed down from chefs to apprentices for generations. The Miroir range of glazes is an integral part of this heritage. Used by Master Patissiers for more than 20 years and in more than 100 countries, Miroir allows you to quickly create an incredibly shiny and glossy finish for your mousse cakes.

Miroir Neutre is a convenient cold application, freeze/thaw stable neutral glaze with a "mirror' finish. Perfect for mousse cakes and fine patisserie.
